# PageNumberSystemTag.UseTestMode property

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the elements to be inserted are shown with a red border that identifies their position and size in order to validate that they are correct. The default value is No.

```csharp
public YesNo UseTestMode { get; set; }
```

## Property Value

Yes if works in mode test; otherwise No.
